Text:
Hey man...you do absolutely brilliant work! Thanks so much!

Can you try upload the Elektor Audio Specials? There are torrents with them, but they're not in English. Its so hard to find I dont even know if they were ever printed in English or not!

Thanks so much for your time and fantastic uploads!! You rule!
Thanks mate, I wonder when we (TPB) will start having newspapers in pdf... that would be revolutionary IMO:)

@deathfest  I'm looking in to it!

@ossielmais  What newspaper would you want?
